data.eml:eml: New species of Limipolycystis Schilke, 1970 (Rhabdocoela: Kalyptorhynchia: Polycystididae) from the Western Mediterranean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Artois, Tom, Willems, Wim, Revis, Nathalie, Martens, Paul, Schockaert, Ernest (2012): New species of Limipolycystis Schilke, 1970 (Rhabdocoela: Kalyptorhynchia: Polycystididae) from the Western Mediterranean. Zootaxa 3325: 26-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209538
